title: EU and AI: Is it a lost battle? Take our poll
description: Has Europe already fallen behind in the global race for artificial intelligence? And how far should the EU go to catch up? Take our poll and share your view.
content:
AI has shifted from a niche technology, to the backbone of global power. The US and China pour tens of billions into their AI growth, rolling out powerful models with the support of tech giants and massive data centres.

title: AI is hitting UK harder than other big economies, study finds
description: Britain is losing more jobs than it creates owing to artificial intelligence, Morgan Stanley research suggests
content:
The UK is losing more jobs than it is creating because of artificial intelligence and is being hit harder than rival large economies, new research suggests.
British companies reported that AI had resulted in net job losses over the past 12 months, do... [1992 chars]

title: Meta's Reality Labs layoffs show the harsh pivot from virtual reality to AI
description: As virtual reality app developers worry about the 'winter of VR,' the tech world moves on in its dizzying pivot to artificial intelligence technologies
content:
For a company that rebranded towards creating a virtual reality metaverse, Meta Platforms is certainly taking a sharp pivot towards the apparent next big thing: artificial intelligence.

title: Are Mia Khalifa and Mr. Bean star Rowan Atkinson dating? Former adult star breaks silence on viral image claims
description: A viral image suggesting a romantic relationship between Mia Khalifa and Mr. Bean actor Rowan Atkinson circulated widely on social media. Fact-checkers confirmed the image was AI-generated and the claim false, originating from satire. Khalifa publicly dismissed the rumour, underscoring how artificial intelligence is increasingly used to spread celebrity misinformation online.

title: Amid tussle with China, US turns to domestic rare earth supply chain - with $1.6 bn boost
description: The Trump administration is set to acquire a 10 per cent stake in USA Rare Earth as part of a $1.6 billion investment package, signalling Washington’s growing willingness to deploy state capital to counter China’s dominance in rare earth processing and secure supply chains vital for defence, artificial intelligence and clean energy technologies

title: Malaysian ringgit, stocks hit highest since 2018 on AI, growth
description: THE Malaysian ringgit rose to the strongest level in more than seven years, buoyed by optimism over the country's ties to the artificial intelligence supply chain and the nation's growth outlook. The benchmark equity index also advanced.
content:

title: AI is not UPI: Why going by the UPI model risks stalling progress on artificial intelligence
description: Analysis challenges applying India's UPI success model to AI development, arguing that state-led compute provisioning and centralized control could stall innovation. Unlike UPI's standardized payment system, AI evolved through complex global supply chains involving multiple components. The piece cites failed US semiconductor controls on China as evidence that centralized approaches don't work, as Chinese firms adapted by reconfiguring supply chains. The authors warn against India's 'national champions' approach, suggesting AI sovereignty requires global participation rather than administrative control.
content: A growing debate in India's technology policy circles centers on whether the country should apply its successful UPI model to artificial intelligence development. However, this reasoning presents fundamental flaws that could potentially stall rather ... [8785 chars]
